name: Root on Wheels
description:
In the land of bunnies, a truck arrives. It is the Root On Wheels! The bunnies queue up to be served crisp dishes, all based on different root vegetables. Now it is up to you to fulfill their orders, and fling your spatula around to make sure the right veggie gets to the right place. 

Developed for Global Game Jam at TGJ Karlstad. Team:
(to be written)

Source code is available at: https://github.com/ErikHogberg/RootsGlobalGameJam2023
